name: Carnot cycle
author: alysium
notes:
Played restart heroes undefeated to legend 2 but got demoted by some ridiculous grit triggers against sylvans. Switched to Geargias for some more relaxing duels and hit KOG with a total of 48wins. 
I only play 2 Ties bc I only have 2 but never really missed the third one. Mirror Wall was the MVP of the deck - no one plays around it anymore.
